title: [Vornavian Coast, North Beach]
description: Choked, dying grasses cling desperately to life atop a short dune here.  The beach is very wide between the cliffs and the shore here, and the tide seems very far off.

Choked, dying grasses cling desperately to life atop a short dune here.  The black sands afford no comfort to the grasses, which wither in the beating sun.  The beach is very wide between the cliffs and the shore here, and the tide seems very far off.
